title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ: ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example opens on XML files by default:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file called test.xml.
3. The editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content.
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator.
5. Choose 'Open With...' and select 'Default Text Editor'.

Observed Behavior:
- Nothing happens.
- The scripted resource editor example is reactivated instead of opening the file in the default text editor.

NOTES:
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Follow the steps in 1GEWMOZ: ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example opens on XML files by default.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file called test.xml.
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator.
5. Choose 'Open With...' and select 'Default Text Editor'.

Expected Behavior:
- A new editor should open on the file because the editor type is different from the scripted resource editor example.
